name: Sling Punk
description:
Developed by Team Tree Games for the ScoreSpace Jam #17

Theme: Protect. In order to achieve a higher score you must protect the robots body, as the more damage it takes the more score you lose.

Description: 

   sling like no bot has slung before.

   In this game you only have one movement option. Thrusting yourself violently through the air. Watch out though the more damage you take  the more points you will lose.

   Complete all the levels to be able to submit your score to the leaderboard.

Controls

Hold left click, drag and release to launch the bot.

Credits

  • Jacoby - Game Director, Lead Programmer, Sound Design
  • Andrew - Level Design, Programming
  • Adam Scott Edmonds (ASE) - Art, Music
